class_curandeiro_description: Master of recovery, keeps the team alive with heals and protective buffs.
class_mago_description: Controls the elements to deal area damage and apply debuffs to enemies.
class_tank_description: Unshakeable, protects allies by drawing enemy attention and absorbing damage.
class_arqueiro_description: Ranged damage specialist, takes down priority targets with deadly precision.
class_ladino_description: Master of stealth, attacks from the shadows and deals unexpected critical damage.

update_announcement_intro: Hello, @everyone! The bot has received a major update with many new features and improvements. Here's what's new:
update_announcement_profiles_desc:
- **Automatic Creation**: Your personal profile channel is now created automatically.
- **Private Threads**: Inside your channel, you'll find private threads for **Missions**, **Milestones**, and an **Exclusive Shop**.
- **Interactive Buttons**: Equip items or select milestones to display directly from your profile.
update_announcement_missions_desc:
- **Dynamic Difficulty**: Missions now adapt to your progress. The more you play, the more challenging they become!
- **Item Rewards**: In addition to XP and Coins, you can now earn rare items by completing missions.
- **Auto-Collect**: Enable auto-collect to get your rewards instantly upon completion.
update_announcement_clans_desc:
- **Level Requirement**: You must be level 10 to found a clan.
- **Custom Roles**: Clans now have their own role with a custom name and color.
- **Private Channels**: Clans can have their own private text channel for members only.
update_announcement_shop_desc: - The main shop is now a permanent, interactive message in its own channel. Select and buy items with ease!
update_announcement_items_desc: - A huge number of new items have been added, with a detailed rarity system, including the mythical **Kardec** rarity, which grants its own unique role!
update_announcement_outro: Explore the new commands and features! We hope you enjoy the new experience.
